responseText: Leaks, it would seem. When things die here, the essence of their being scatters from its corporeal form. You may have seen this happen already. Some remains in the form of glint, but the majority of what was goes somewhere. Perhaps underground to be remade in the rootways and returned here. It will take lifetimes to unravel the mysteries of this place.
name: DD_0100_ClericPetrah_13_Response
